item.title: Listen to the Latest ‘KFF Health News Minute’
item.description: The "KFF Health News Minute” brings original health care and health policy reporting from our newsroom to the airwaves each week.

item.title: ‘Cancer Doesn’t Care’: Citizen Lobbyists Unite To Push Past Washington’s Ugly Politics
item.description: Despite a poisonous political climate, hundreds of volunteer advocates put partisan differences aside and pressed Congress to help people with cancer.

item.title: Private Medicare, Medicaid Plans Exaggerate In-Network Mental Health Options, Watchdogs Say
item.description: A federal probe of Medicare and Medicaid plans run by private insurance companies found that the plan operators often overstated how many mental healt...

item.title: ‘Chemtrail’ Theories Warn of Health Dangers From Contrails. The Idea Takes Wing at Kennedy’s HHS.
item.description: Get our weekly newsletter, The Week in Brief, featuring a roundup of our original coverage, Fridays at 2 p.m. ET.

item.title: Luego de criticar a demócratas por su política transgénero, Newsom veta una medida de salud clave
item.description: La ley habría obligado a las aseguradoras a cubrir y a las farmacéuticas a dispensar 12 meses de terapia hormonal de una sola vez a pacientes transgén...
